objects.text:
• 60 Hours Playtime
• Active Noise Cancellation
• Hi-Fi Deep Bass Sound

product_details.name: TUINYO Wireless Headphones - Noise Cancelling Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones with 60H Playtime, Deep Bass Hi-Fi Stereo Sound & Comfortable Earpads for Travel, Home and Office-Green…
product_details.description: Noise Control: Active Noise Cancellation. Headphones Jack: 3.5 mm Jack. Model Name: WH-960. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: Plastic. Specific Uses For Product: Music, Travel, Gaming. Charging Time: 2 Hours. Compatible Devices: Television. Control Type: Media Control. Cable Feature: Without Cable. Item Weight: 11.2 ounces. Customer Package Type: FFP. Style: Modern. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 60 Hours. Bluetooth Range: 10 Meters. Bluetooth Version: 5.3. Earpiece Shape: Round. Product Dimensions: 5 x 3 x 7 inches. Batteries: 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included). Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern design promoting a pair of headphones. It has a deep green gradient background with subtle circular overlays and square motifs that add depth without distraction. A large product image ("product_image") dominates the right side, providing a clear and appealing showcase. The left side includes the main heading ("heading") in bold white, a subheading ("subheading") in a futuristic mint green, and a short highlight line graphic ("decorative") below it. The features list ("description") is succinct and neatly arranged with bullet points. The price ("price") is emphasized in large mint typography, and a clear call-to-action button includes a green rectangle ("cta_background") and contrasting dark green text ("cta"). All elements are well-balanced and visually aligned, designed for strong product messaging and user engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Green: #174332
- Forest Green: #28624A
- Mint Green: #9ECEAB
- Lighter Green Accent: #73B88C
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features sleek, modern headphones in a soft, pastel sage green color, giving it a minimalistic yet premium appearance. The color palette for the advertisement banner can be derived from various shades and highlights seen on the headphones: sage green (#C1D1BA), metallic mint (#B3C8B0), deep olive gray (#8F998A), soft silver shine highlights (#E6EAE3), and muted shadow gray (#6A6F66). The matte and metallic finishes blend harmoniously, with subtle reflections enhancing contour and depth. These tones highlight texture and build quality, while maintaining a calm, sophisticated aesthetic perfect for lifestyle-focused, tech-savvy marketing visuals.
